  • SEARCH: 
 

Package <Unnamed>

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    This class represents the board of a Kakuro Puzzle which is made up of tiles.
    Fonts
    This class is able to register and load custom fonts for use with JPanels
    GameLogic
    This class is able to return the horizontal and vertical sum of an open tile, keep track of the row and column index of an open tile, and generate the possible set of numbers that a user could enter for a specific open tile.
    KakuroPuzzle
    This class represents a Kakuro Puzzle game which is able to display clues to a user, save the current state of a game, start a new game, open a saved game and allow the user to continue playing, or exit and allow the user to "continue" where they left off
    OpenTile
    This class represents an open tile that has the ability to create a string representation of itself, handle user input, return a value entered in this tile by the user, clear itself.
    SumGenerator
    This class generates all the possible numbers between 1 and 9 that could be added to produce the sum of a particular target number.
    SumTile
    This class creates the sum tiles of a Kakuro Puzzle which hold the vertical and horizontal sum and has the ability to return its horizontal and vertical sum, as well as return a string representation of itself
    Tile
    This class represents a tile of size 40 pixels where each tile contains a row index and column index, and contains the method to return a string representation of itself
